    • Method Detail

      • addArg

        public CommandTool.Builder addArg(java.lang.String format,
                         SourcePath... inputs)
        Add a String argument represented by the format string to the command. The inputs will be resolved and used to format the format string when this argument is added to the command.
        Parameters:
        format - the format string representing the argument.
        inputs - SourcePaths to use when formatting format.

      • addArg

        public CommandTool.Builder addArg(SourcePath input)
        Add a `SourcePath` as an argument to the command.
